content: HONG KONG  Sept 25 Oaktree Capital Group LLC sees opportunities to invest "more aggressively" in Chinese and Indian distressed debt as the legal and regulatory systems of the countries develop  Chief Executive Jay Wintrob said on Monday.

content: July 12 Isola USA Corp  a supplier to the semiconductor and electronics industry  has tapped an investment bank to restructure its approximately $525 million debt load  as competition from Asia saps its profits  according to people familiar with the matter.

content: OKLAHOMA CITY/NEW YORK  Sept 9 The judge overseeing Aubrey McClendon's estate approved a land deal on Friday that will pay off one of the late energy magnate's major creditors  paving the way for the sale of his stake in professional basketball team the Oklahoma City Thunder.
name: Oaktree Capital Group LLC
title: Oklahoma judge OKs McClendon land sale  freeing Thunder stake

content: DUBLIN  June 9 Ireland's state-run "bad bank" selected U.S. private equity firm Oaktree Capital Group LLC as preferred bidder for two portfolios of non-performing loans that have a combined par value of 4.7 billion euros ($5.3 bln)  a source close to the deal said on Thursday.
name: Oaktree Capital Group LLC
title: Ireland's NAMA sells $5.3 bln loan portfolio to U.S. firm Oaktree -source

content: May 25 Shareholder advisory firm Glass Lewis & Co said in a report that Tribune Publishing Co  shareholders should not heed Gannett Co Inc's call to withhold votes for Tribune's board nominees at its upcoming annual meeting on June 2.
name: Oaktree Capital Group LLC
title: Glass Lewis recommends shareholders vote for Tribune Publishing board

content: * Believe it incumbent upon tribune publishing's board to establish an independent committee with its own independent advisors
name: Oaktree Capital Group LLC
title: BRIEF-Oaktree Capital comments on Tribune Publishing-Gannett deal

content: CHICAGO Caesars Entertainment Corp  has offered $4 billion in a new plan to help its casino operating unit emerge from Chapter 11  a lawyer for the unit told a U.S. Bankruptcy judge on Wednesday.
name: Oaktree Capital Group LLC
title: Caesars offers $4 bln to help casino unit exit bankruptcy

content: May 16 Gannett Co Inc  the publisher of USA Today  raised  its unsolicited offer for Tribune Publishing Co to $15 per share from $12.25  valuing the publisher of the Chicago Tribune and the Los Angeles Times at about $475 million.
name: Oaktree Capital Group LLC
title: UPDATE 4-Gannett raises Tribune offer to about $864 mln including debt

content: CHICAGO  May 18 Caesars Entertainment Corp  has offered $4 billion in a new plan to help its casino operating unit emerge from Chapter 11  a lawyer for the unit told a U.S. Bankruptcy judge on Wednesday.
name: Oaktree Capital Group LLC
title: UPDATE 2-Caesars offers $4 bln to help casino unit exit bankruptcy

content: PARIS Oaktree Capital  plans to sell its stake in SGD Pharma  a French company that specializes in making glass packaging for the pharmaceutical sector  and has mandated JP Morgan  and Lazard  to drive the process  two sources close to the deal told Reuters on Friday.
name: Oaktree Capital Group LLC
title: Oaktree appoints banks for planned sale of SGD Pharma: sources

content: PARIS  Feb 12 Oaktree Capital plans to sell its stake in SGD Pharma  a French company that specialises in making glass packaging for the pharmaceutical sector  and has mandated JP Morgan and Lazard to drive the process  two sources close to the deal told Reuters on Friday.

title: Oaktree appoints banks for planned sale of SGD Pharma -sources

content: HONG KONG  Nov 5 Howard Marks  co-founder and chairman of Oaktree Capital  the world's largest distressed debt investor  said on Thursday he expects to raise more funds from Chinese high net worth investors to buy distressed debt overseas.
name: Oaktree Capital Group LLC
title: Oaktree's Marks says to tap more Chinese funds for distressed debt

content: NEW YORK Howard Marks  co-founder and chairman of Oaktree Capital  the world's largest distressed debt investor  said on Tuesday that no assets in financial markets were "absolutely cheap" but that stock valuations were not excessive.
name: Oaktree Capital Group LLC
title: Oaktree's Marks says no bargains in financial markets: CNBC

content: NEW YORK  April 7 Howard Marks  co-founder and chairman of Oaktree Capital  the world's largest distressed debt investor  said on Tuesday that no assets in financial markets were "absolutely cheap" but that stock valuations were not excessive.
name: Oaktree Capital Group LLC
title: Oaktree's Marks says no bargains in financial markets - CNBC
